column4: what chat program should i get thats free and will connect to freenode, x-chat only givs a 30 day try for windows?
i found one called y chat a while ago, but i guess it got pulled off
there are xchat builds for windows that aren't restricted
for example: http://www.silverex.org/download/ (I'm sure google can find more for you if you look, I know there are several out there)
